com.scvngr.levelup.core.util

Class CryptographicHashUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.util.CryptographicHashUtil

  • @LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
@ThreadSafe
public final class CryptographicHashUtil
extends Object
    This is a utility class to generate cryptographic hashes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CryptographicHashUtil.Algorithms
      Set of cryptographic hashing algorithms that can be used with getHexHash(String, Algorithms).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String getHexHash(String toHash, CryptographicHashUtil.Algorithms algorithm)
      Takes any string and returns a cryptographic hash of that string in hexadecimal.

    • Method Detail

      • getHexHash

        public static String getHexHash(String toHash,
                CryptographicHashUtil.Algorithms algorithm)
        Takes any string and returns a cryptographic hash of that string in hexadecimal.
        Parameters:
        toHash - String to hash.
        algorithm - The hashing algorithm to use.
        Returns:
        cryptographic hash of toHash in hexadecimal.
